name: International Conference on Inventive Electronics, Computing and Communication Applications
content: Publication in IRO Journals \[Indexing: Google Scholar, Crossref, World Cat, Dimensions, Science Gate\] Publication time 2-3 Weeks from conference date. All authors will be provided with a presentation and publication certificate. Extended versions of the best selected papers will be published in the journals listed below. International Journal of Vehicle Information and Communication Systems - Inderscience Publisher International Journal of Clothing Science and Technology - Emerald Publisher International Journal of Speech Technology - Springer Publisher
